version_description:
- Bénéficiez de vos fonctions favorites à votre poignet grâce à l’application Apple Watch,
- Effacez votre historique de Recherche d’itinéraires,
- Profitez de l’offre de covoiturage Sharette, le nouveau partenaire de la RATP,
- Recherchez des itinéraires prenant en compte les travaux d’été 2015,
- Correctifs apportés aux horaires Bus,
- Mise à jour du menu Shopping,
- Correction de bugs.
Correctifs mineurs.

- Correctifs apportés aux horaires Bus,
- Correction de bugs.
We fixed bugs here and there.

Welcome to Rosa Park, the New station of the RER E!
We also corrected some bugs in the buses timetable.
Happy new year !
We fixed a few bugs and updated the maps. Have a good trip!

It's the end of the carpooling experiment with Sharette.
RATP thanks all the drivers and the passengers that took part of it !

We also updated the lines and timetables.

All on its own, the app updates transport data, with improved response when your bus route is extended or when a new tram arrives near you.
Since there’s not just home and work in your life you can now create personalised favourites: a trendy bar, a special restaurant or even your granny!
For the super-farseeing among you, we have added bus timetables in .pdf format.
And for those fans of the latest technology, the 3D Touch display is here at last: with one click, access the transport systems near you, with a map of the Metro, or even find out how to get home.
Finally, this version cures a number of obstinate bugs.
We fixed the ios 7 bug, we’re really sorry for the inconvience!
We fixed the ios 7 bug, we’re really sorry for the inconvience!

In this new version of the app, the RATP finishes your sentences thanks to predictive text. And, as always, we are still working to fix a few stubborn bugs, for instance we got rid of the last one with VoiceOver.

We have corrected some minor geolocation problems as well as the black screen that some of you see at start-up.  We have also improved data collection for Velib and Autolib. Therefore, there should no longer be an offset with the current situation! We are working on other points that you have brought to our attention as well on improving the application. It will continue to evolve in order to better meet your needs. Thank you all for your encouragement and your precious feedback. Please don’t hesitate to contact us through the dedicated section in the application.

We fixed some nasty bugs on the home-page to provide a more user-friendly navigation. 
The app will continue to evolve towards even greater responsiveness to your needs.
Please don’t hesitate to contact us through the dedicated section in the application, for any comments, inquiries or questions, it helps us to improve!

iPhone 4 and 4S owners, we’ve taken on board what you've said!! Because geolocation was asking too much of your phone, we've designed a special version just for you that is faster and uses fewer resources.

Do you have a lot of favourites? We now offer 2 solutions to view them in the blink of an eye:

- A brand new widget: practical, fast, no need to open the application to see the upcoming arrivals
- A brand new option to try: A simpler, more streamlined homepage, your network map and favourites, that’s it! To find this option, go to the “try a new option” tab in our main menu. You can turn it on or off as you wish!

Why not tell us what you think of these new features? We look forward to hearing from you.
You’ll never again wind up on the wrong side of the street or roundabout! Our app now displays the exact number of the exit you need to arrive at your destination!
Correction of a bug in the case of the disruptions in itinerary researches

We carry on improving the application to be closer to your needs.
Consider giving us a (good) review at the Store and please don’t hesitate to contact us, via the dedicated section on the application, should you have any remarks, requests or questions !

Welcome to Tramway line T11!
Be sure to consult the updates on the bus lines impacted by the arrival of this new tramway line as well as the corrections made to the timetables and to fix software bugs.

Looking for a direction ? Search has never been easier ! Quickly search and go to any Point Of Interest (such as public places, public administration, restaurants,...).
Ride a bike ! The app gives you the best direction and all interesting information to ride a Velib (bike share service) to your final destination

Tweet and keep track of service disruptions within the RATP app ! Twitter is back in your app ! From now on, you can retweet or follow your favorite RATP lines without getting out of the app !
Get in touch more easily with the RATP team with our new contact form.
Get further ! The new 260 bus line is now available on the app !
As always, we did some bug fixes and now the app is even cooler on the iPhone X !

Thanks to this new version of the RATP application, be better informed ! In case of major event impacting our transport network, a new display will appear to inform you about the current situation. We also did some technical optimizations.
Discover a new commuting way in this new version of the RATP application that features the Communauto parking spots, the self-service bookable car sharing service.
Discover a new way of travelling throughout the city with Cityscoot, the self-service scooter app. Look at the map and see at a glance the scooters available around you!

We are currently working on improving our real-time traffic alert service (mailing and push notifications).
Feel free to send us your feedback using the contact form of the application.
Report any cleanliness problem noticed on your trip, using the new dedicated form accessible from the menu.
This version fixes several major bugs.

- Summer is here! See the air-conditioned lines on your itinerary
- Discover the services and shops available in the stations around you directly from the map
- Check all planned works directly from the home screen
- Bugs have also been fixed

RATP has an updated version of its app for you! It has been redesigned with your help so it has got what you need to get around every day.

Take advantage of new usability redesigned for you as well as new features. Optimise your journeys by viewing which part of the train to get in, have your favourites to hand, benefit from quick access to your features, find where you are on the interactive map and even look at your maps offline.

This version contains the map of the new Paris bus network, coming into service from April, 20th onwards.

This version also fixes the widget.
Smartly prepare your mobility with a new service currently being tested: check the real-time operating status of elevators, escalators and moving walkways in the stations on lines 4 and 14.

Traffic disruptions’ display has been redesigned to provide you with clearer information.

Our real-time traffic alert service (mailing and push notifications) has been improved.

The version also contains bug fixes.
This version contains bug fixes.

You’ve been waiting for them, here they come! The route map now displays the next departures in real time.

Traffic disruptions’ display has been redesigned to provide you with clearer information.

Our real-time traffic alert service (mailing and push notifications) has been improved.

The back-up of your favorite addresses and times has been fixed.

The version also contains many bug fixes and optimizations.

Thanks again for your feedback. The RATP mobile team wishes you a merry Christmas and a happy New Year!
New Cityscoot routes! Find in real time the closest scooter, estimate the travel time and discover a new way of travelling the city.
Smartly prepare your mobility with a new service currently being tested: check the real-time operating status of elevators, escalators and moving walkways in the stations on lines 4 and 14.
This version contains bug fixes.

This version contains the map of the new Paris bus network, coming into service from April, 20th onwards.

This version also fixes the widget.

RATP has an updated version of its app for you! It has been redesigned with your help so it has got what you need to get around every day.

Take advantage of new usability redesigned for you as well as new features. Optimise your journeys by viewing which part of the train to get in, have your favourites to hand, benefit from quick access to your features, find where you are on the interactive map and even look at your maps offline.

Recently, RATP has released a new version of its app for you! It has been redesigned with your help so it has got what you need to get around every day.

Since its release, we took into account some of your returns: the display of your next departures has been fixed and you can visualize all the works impacting your favorite lines. Bugs have also been fixed.

We continue to improve the application thanks to your comments.

- Summer is here! See the air-conditioned lines on your itinerary
- Discover the services and shops available in the stations around you directly from the map
- Check all planned works directly from the home screen
- Bugs have also been fixed

- Summer is here! See the air-conditioned lines on your itinerary
- Discover the services and shops available in the stations around you directly from the map
- Check all planned works directly from the home screen
- Bugs have also been fixed

- Your fellow widget is back! Add it and find at a glance the available Vélib’ and the next departures at your favorite stations.
- Line maps are back as well! Check the maps of your bus, tram, metro, trains...and share them around!
- Stay up to date thanks to the press articles selected by Microsoft News.
- Discover new routes! Find your way with Cityscoot electric scooters or plan your carsharing commute with Klaxit.
- Sort your favorites stations as you wish and choose the info that you need most.
- This version also contains bugfix.
This version fixes several major bugs.

- New routes available: on foot, by bike, or by car!
- Customize your homepage in the settings section and reorder your features as you wish.
- Check in a glance the bus lines running around you and the Velib bikes available by zooming on the map.
- This version also contains bugfix.
This version contains bugfixes and optimizations.
This version contains bugfixes.
We added a quick and easy-to-reach access to the next departure times at the top of your homepage!

Your train and bus destinations are now displayed in "My stations".
This version also contains bug fixes.
Happy new year!
The address search engine has been improved! Now you can search for places such as monuments, restaurants or bars.

The address search engine has been improved! Now you can search for places such as monuments, restaurants or bars.
This version also contains a bugfix about the display of your favorite addresses and search history.

- Compare faster your itinerary results, now sorted by transport mode (public transport, on foot, by bike…).
- A new button enables you to pick your favorite public transports (metro, bus, tram…).
- The "Leave earlier / Leave later" option is back! Easily change your departure or arrival time.
- Quickly reach the last viewed itinerary from the search history.
- Tap on the next departure tables to reach the line schedules.
- The app now displays new private hire itineraries with Kapten.
- Visualize on the map the entrances and exits of train and metro stations.
- All the maps of Transilien and RER lines are now available.
- This version also contains bugfixes.

- The "Schedules" button now enables you to search next departures by line and by station!
- The suggested metro station access and the burned calories have been added to your itinerary details.
- This version also contains bugfixes.

CommittedTogether
Check our latest travel information and find out how we’re responding to coronavirus. Apply the right measures and keep everyone safe.
Download the latest version of our app and stay informed.
Welcome back on our lines. Take care of yourself.

Discover our new ‘passenger density crowdsourcing’ feature, available across our entire network. Fuss-free and easy to use, this service allows you to tune-in to indicate the density of the passenger flow on your journey in order to contribute to the general safety and comfort on our lines.

Discover our new “passenger density crowdsourcing” service. Fuss-free and easy to use, this service allows you to assess crowd levels in your carriage and consult passenger density throughout your itinerary so your commute is as smooth as can be.

This new version offers :
· Global improvements and bug fixes on the widget
· Bug fixes throughout the app

This new version offers:
· A new intuitive navigation bar for a smoother transition between tabs
· A new streamlined itinerary search with improved ergonomics for an optimized user experience
· General interface improvements and bug fixes throughout the app

This new version offers:
· A new intuitive navigation bar for a smoother transition between tabs
· A new streamlined itinerary search with improved ergonomics for an optimized user experience
· General interface improvements and bug fixes throughout the app

This new version offers:
. A new enriched itinerary preview including live departure times display
. Brand new push notification sounds
. General improvements and bug fixes on the VoiceOver feature in the itinerary search

This new version offers:
. A new enriched itinerary preview including live departure times display
. Brand new push notification sounds
. General improvements and bug fixes on the VoiceOver feature in the itinerary search

This new version offers:
· A new map search with improved ergonomics
. Various optimizations of the itinerary search for a smoother experience
. Bug fixes throughout the app

This new version offers:
. The addition of fares in the itinerary search
. General interface improvements and bug fixes throughout the app

This new version offers:
. The addition of fares in the itinerary search
. General interface improvements and bug fixes throughout the app
This version offers general interface improvements and bug fixes throughout the app.
This version offers general interface improvements and bug fixes throughout the app.

Your needs are evolving; so is your app!
We make a point of providing frequent updates and bug fixes in order to accompany you as best as we can in your day to day commutes.
See you soon on the RATP app!

We value your knowledge of our network.
Which is why we’ve come up with a new button to allow you to enrich the itinerary search with alternative route suggestions or report any error that would have snuck in.
See you soon on the RATP app!

We value your knowledge of our network.
Which is why we’ve come up with a new button to allow you to enrich the itinerary search with alternative route suggestions or report any error that would have snuck in.
See you soon on the RATP app!

Your needs are evolving; so is your app!
We make a point of providing frequent updates and bug fixes in order to accompany you as best as we can in your day to day commutes.
See you soon on the RATP app!

This new version will get you excited about shortcuts.
Our two new iOS 14 widgets now allow you to access your favorite addresses directly from your home screen.
Your hands are full? We’ve got you covered. Simply ask Siri for directions.
We’ve also added a long press shortcut on the app icon so you can easily access the app’s main features on the go.
See you soon on the RATP app!

Cette nouvelle version ravira les adeptes des raccourcis.
Grâce aux nouveaux widgets pour iOS 14, vous pouvez désormais effectuer une recherche d'itinéraire express vers vos adresses favorites directement depuis l’écran d’accueil de votre téléphone.
Inconditionnel.le de Siri ? On ne vous oublie pas ! Vous pouvez également lancer une recherche vocale.
Pour les plus pressés, un nouveau raccourci vous permet maintenant d’accéder directement aux rubriques clé en maintenant le doigt appuyé sur l’icône de l’app.
A très vite sur l’appli RATP !

Le prochain train n'est jamais bien loin !
Vous souhaitez consulter les horaires et les prochains départs autour de vous ? Retrouver facilement tous vos favoris à proximité ?
La nouvelle rubrique horaires vous permet maintenant d’anticiper tous vos déplacements en un clin d’oeil.

Gardez une longueur d'avance en rechargeant votre passe Navigo directement depuis votre iPhone !
Rendez-vous dans la rubrique Titres, posez simplement votre passe au dos de votre iPhone pour afficher les titres disponibles à l'achat ! Faites votre sélection, payez et rechargez votre passe Navigo en le posant de nouveau à l'arrière de votre iPhone.
C'est aussi simple que ça.

Gardez une longueur d'avance en rechargeant votre passe Navigo directement depuis votre iPhone !
Rendez-vous dans la rubrique Titres, posez simplement votre passe au dos de votre iPhone pour afficher les titres disponibles à l'achat ! Faites votre sélection, payez et rechargez votre passe Navigo en le posant de nouveau à l'arrière de votre iPhone.
C'est aussi simple que ça.

Gardez une longueur d'avance en rechargeant votre passe Navigo directement depuis votre iPhone !
Rendez-vous dans la rubrique Titres, posez simplement votre passe au dos de votre iPhone pour afficher les titres disponibles à l'achat ! Faites votre sélection, payez et rechargez votre passe Navigo en le posant de nouveau à l'arrière de votre iPhone.
C'est aussi simple que ça.

Siri s'enrichit ! En un mot, demandez-lui l'itinéraire vers n'importe lequel de vos favoris.
Rendez-vous dans la nouvelle rubrique "Mes raccourcis Siri" du menu, et ajoutez vos raccourcis en un clic.
A très vite sur l’appli RATP !
